resources.string:
Hi, My name is Obinna. 

I love Android Development, 

This is why I have decided to become an Android Developer. 
For the past few months, I have been self learning Kotlin, the generally accepted programming language for Android development by Google and so far, it has been an amazing journey. 

I have a lot of projects in mind already I would love to put out there for the benefit of a good number of people using my acquired skills. 

I have also for the sake of consistency and achieving my goals, joined the 100DaysOfCode challenge on Twitter where I constantly update my daily progress on learning Kotlin and Android Development for the next 100 days currently on the 16th day. 

I will be adopting the project based learning process, where I will be building out different projects that cut across different learning concepts to further equip me for the Android development Job Market.
